title: Just My Size Wireless Bra Pack, Full Coverage, Leopard Satin, Wirefree Plus-Size Bra; aizes from 32C to 50DD; ajustable straps in the front; 90% nylon, 10% spandex; everyday bra pack and 1 satin bra; leopard print and other colors (white, nude, and others)
descriptions:
Introducing the Just My Size Wireless Bra Pack, a must-have for all plus-size women seeking comfort and style. This pack includes a single bra that offers full coverage and is wirefree, perfect for everyday wear. 

With a range of sizes available from 32C to 50DD, you can find the perfect fit for your body shape. The adjustable front straps ensure a customizable fit that suits your preferences. 

Made from a blend of 90% nylon and 10% spandex, this bra provides a soft and stretchy feel while offering excellent support. The pack includes a satin bra, adding a touch of luxury to your collection. 

Choose from a variety of patterns and colors, including a trendy leopard print, classic white, subtle nude, and other attractive options. 

This bra features a wide band and rows of hook-and-eye closures to provide optimal support and a secure fit. The front-adjustable straps make it easy to find the perfect fit every time you wear it. 

Upgrade your lingerie collection with the Just My Size Wireless Bra Pack and experience comfort, style, and confidence like never before.

The bra is made from a high-quality blend of nylon and spandex, providing a soft and stretchy feel. The pack includes a satin bra, adding a touch of elegance to your lingerie collection. 

Choose from a variety of patterns and colors, including leopard print, white, nude, and others, to suit your personal style. 

This wire-free plus-size bra offers excellent support with its wide band and rows of hook-and-eye closures. You can feel confident and secure all day long. 

Upgrade your lingerie collection with the Just My Size Wireless Bra Pack. It combines comfort, style, and functionality to provide you with the perfect fit and support.

In addition to the everyday bra, this pack also includes a satin bra, perfect for special occasions or when you want to add a touch of luxury to your lingerie collection. 

Choose from a variety of patterns and colors, including leopard print, white, nude, and other options, to suit your personal style.

Experience the perfect blend of comfort, style, and support with the Just My Size Wireless Bra Pack. Upgrade your lingerie collection today!
